attributes.review: This app messed my phone up! I couldn’t download any other apps while having this installed it leaves bugs and my phone was frozen for 24 hours! I do not recommend at all👎🏽
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: This app has so many glitches and keeps freezing! So many bugs and racism on the app it makes my head hurt and vomit. I really hate this app and it should be taken off for how terrible it is and works! 😡😤
attributes.title: Worst app ever created!

attributes.review: When I went to go download it it showed pic of you know what then it kept giving me spam calls and now my phone has a the Corona virus and my Siri will not work and it made my bf break up with me and made a bear take my lunch.
attributes.title: Ewwww Dont get this APP

attributes.review: The graphics on the app are terrible. The slogan is historically inaccurate. The logo is a disgrace to the American eye. And don’t even get me started about how slow the app runs. It’s so slow that the morals and values it stands behind somehow are still stuck in the 1900s, misogynistic and racist America. 🧚‍♂️💫✨🥴🤮
attributes.title: ABSOLUTE ABOMINATION

attributes.review: watch out this app steals info such as your credit card number, ss#, pictures, other private info and uses the camera to have a 24/7 view of what you’re doing!
attributes.title: This app steals your info!

attributes.review: so corey my crocodile wanted me to get this app so i did then he ATE ME??? like what the heck my mom totally told me not to ride him while eating eggplant but like i couldn’t resist but annnnyways corey is actually a republican so i put him in the oven and now he looks like trump
attributes.title: the color of my breath smells like this app

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see how wonderful our president was doing but all i kept seeing was pictures of literally one cheeto. idk who made this app but they seriously need to take things a little more seriously around here.
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: Let’s start off with the TikTok bs. If you ban it, that will start more riots and only make America worse. That slogan is a lie, because all you have done is put a target on America’s back. So take your fake hair and leave the office.
attributes.title: The US is screwed if you stay, Trump.

attributes.review: This app is terrible. I cannot even believe the quality, utter 🐮 trash. It crashed instantly. Here i was, sitting at the most expensive restaurant🍖 at disney world🌎 and this crashed!!! How embarrassing 😚. Would not recommend. This is very much not adequate ❗️
attributes.title: ♥️Absolutely Not ♥️

attributes.review: This is absolutely awful. I have no Idea how to navigate threw the app and who wants to input there phone number. That is a security violation to me and all the other users. I don’t recommend getting the app under any circumstances!!!!           BAD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
